com.ibm.mqlight.api.network

Interface NetworkListener


  • public interface NetworkListener
    A listener for events that occur on a particular network channel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose(NetworkChannel channel)
      Called when the network connection is closed at the remote end.
      void onError(NetworkChannel channel, Exception exception)
      Called when an error occurs on the network connection - for example because the process at the remote end of the connection abruptly ends.
      void onRead(NetworkChannel channel, io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer)
      Called when data is read from the network.

    • Method Detail

      • onRead

        void onRead(NetworkChannel channel,
          io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer)
        Called when data is read from the network.
        Parameters:
        channel - identifies which network connection the data was read from.
        buffer - contains the data that has been read. The buffer belongs to the implementation of this method - and will not be altered by the implementation of NetworkService once this method has been invoked.

        Once the buffer is finished with the ReferenceCounted.release() method must be called to return the buffer to the pool, otherwise a memory leak will eventually be reported by the ResourceLeakDetector.

      • onClose

        void onClose(NetworkChannel channel)
        Called when the network connection is closed at the remote end.
        Parameters:
        channel - identifies which network connections was closed.

      • onError

        void onError(NetworkChannel channel,
           Exception exception)
        Called when an error occurs on the network connection - for example because the process at the remote end of the connection abruptly ends.
        Parameters:
        channel - identifies which network connection the error relates to.
        exception - an exception relating to the error condition.
